alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Sullivan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 30 at 7:25AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN SULLIVAN...MERCER...WESTERN PUTNAM AND NORTHEASTERN HARRISON COUNTIES... At 725 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles east of Lamoni to 11 miles east of Eagleville to near Cainsville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Unionville, Princeton, Mercer, Cainsville, Newtown, Pollock, Mount Moriah, Lucerne, Powersville, Pleasanton, South Lineville and Lemons. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
